ygData.subject: bayle list quest
ygData.msgSnippet: the reward for turning in the list to pietro is the rage war maul, an SK only 2hb weapon (!) 16/46 and 15 to magic resist. not that special.. but it d be a
ygData.messageBody:
the reward for turning in the list to pietro is the rage war maul, an SK
only 2hb weapon (!) 16/46 and 15 to magic resist. not that special.. but
it'd be a nice weapon for a lvl 20ish shadowknight, since that is about the
level at which you could complete this quest alone. (just for reference,
that is a slightly better damage/delay ratio than a well balanced 2h sword
or 2h axe, so it isnt all THAT bad ;))

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
